verses.verse: Then <WG5119> came <WG4334> <WG5736> to Yeshuw`a <WG2424> scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> P'rushim <WG5330>, which were of <WG575> Yerushalayim <WG2414>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>,

Why <WG1302> do thy <WG4675> Talmidim <WG3101> transgress <WG3845> <WG5719> the tradition <WG3862> of the elders <WG4245>? for <WG1063> they wash <WG3538> <WG5731> not <WG3756> their <WG846> hands <WG5495> when <WG3752> they eat <WG2068> <WG5725> bread <WG740>.

But <WG1161> he answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Why <WG1302> do ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> transgress <WG3845> <WG5719> the Mitzvah <WG1785> of 'Elohim <WG2316> by <WG1223> your <WG5216> tradition <WG3862>?

For <WG1063> 'Elohim <WG2316> commanded <WG1781> <WG5662>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Honour <WG5091> <WG5720> thy <WG4675> father <WG3962> and <WG2532> mother <WG3384>: and <WG2532>, He that curseht <WG2551> <WG5723> father <WG3962> or <WG2228> mother <WG3384>, let him die <WG5053> <WG5720> the death <WG2288>.

But <WG1161> ye <WG5210> say <WG3004> <WG5719>, Whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> shall say <WG2036> <WG5632> to his father <WG3962> or <WG2228> his mother <WG3384>, It is a gift <WG1435>, by <WG1537> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> thou mightest be profited <WG5623> <WG5686> by me <WG1700>;

And <WG2532> honour <WG5091> <WG5661> not <WG3364> his <WG846> father <WG3962> or <WG2228> his <WG846> mother <WG3384>, he shall be free. Thus <WG2532> have ye made <WG208> the Mitzvah <WG1785> of 'Elohim <WG2316> of none effect <WG208> <WG5656> by <WG1223> your <WG5216> tradition <WG3862>.
Ye hypocrites <WG5273>, well <WG2573> did <WG4395> Esaias <WG2268> prophesy <WG4395> <WG5656> of <WG4012> you <WG5216>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>,

This <WG3778> people <WG2992> draweth nigh <WG1448> <WG5719> unto me <WG3427> with their <WG846> mouth <WG4750>, and <WG2532> honoureth <WG5091> <WG5719> me <WG3165> with their lips <WG5491>; but <WG1161> their <WG846> heart <WG2588> is <WG568> <WG5719> far <WG4206> from <WG575> me <WG1700>.
But <WG1161> in vain <WG3155> they do worship <WG4576> <WG5736> me <WG3165>, teaching <WG1321> <WG5723> for doctrines <WG1319> the Mitzvot <WG1778> of men <WG444>.
And <WG2532> he called <WG4341> <WG5666> the multitude <WG3793>, and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Hear <WG191> <WG5720>, and <WG2532> understand <WG4920> <WG5720>:

Not <WG3756> that which goeth <WG1525> <WG5740> into <WG1519> the mouth <WG4750> defileth <WG2840> <WG5719> a man <WG444>; but <WG235> that which cometh <WG1607> <WG5740> out of <WG1537> the mouth <WG4750>, this <WG5124> defileth <WG2840> <WG5719> a man <WG444>.

Then <WG5119> came <WG4334> <WG5631> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Knowest thou <WG1492> <WG5758> that <WG3754> the P'rushim <WG5330> were offended <WG4624> <WG5681>, after they heard <WG191> <WG5660> this saying <WG3056>?

But <WG1161> he answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Havahry <WG3956> plant <WG5451>, which <WG3739> my <WG3450> heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> hath <WG5452> not <WG3756> planted <WG5452> <WG5656>, shall be rooted up <WG1610> <WG5701>.

Let <WG863> them <WG846> alone <WG863> <WG5628>: they be <WG1526> <WG5748> blind <WG5185> leaders <WG3595> of the blind <WG5185>. And <WG1161> if <WG1437> the blind <WG5185> lead <WG3594> <WG5725> the blind <WG5185>, both <WG297> shall fall <WG4098> <WG5699> into <WG1519> the ditch <WG999>.
Then <WG1161> answered <WG611> <WG5679> Kefa <WG4074> and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Declare <WG5419> <WG5657> unto us <WG2254> this <WG5026> parable <WG3850>.
And <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Are <WG2075> <WG5748> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> yet <WG188> without understanding <WG801>?

Do <WG3539> not <WG3768> ye <WG3539> yet <WG3768> understand <WG3539> <WG5719>, that <WG3754> whatsoever <WG3956> entereth in <WG1531> <WG5740> at <WG1519> the mouth <WG4750> goeth <WG5562> <WG5719> into <WG1519> the belly <WG2836>, and <WG2532> is cast out <WG1544> <WG5743> into <WG1519> the draught <WG856>?

But <WG1161> those things which <WG3588> proceed <WG1607> <WG5740> out of <WG1537> the mouth <WG4750> come forth <WG1831> <WG5736> from <WG1537> the heart <WG2588>; and they <WG2548> defile <WG2840> <WG5719> the man <WG444>.

For <WG1063> out of <WG1537> the heart <WG2588> proceed <WG1831> <WG5736> evil <WG4190> thoughts <WG1261>, murders <WG5408>, adulteries <WG3430>, fornications <WG4202>, thefts <WG2829>, false witness <WG5577>, blasphemies <WG988>:

These <WG5023> are <WG2076> <WG5748> the things which <WG3588> defile <WG2840> <WG5723> a man <WG444>: but <WG1161> to eat <WG5315> <WG5629> with unwashen <WG449> hands <WG5495> defileth <WG2840> <WG5719> not <WG3756> a man <WG444>.
Then <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> went <WG1831> <WG5631> thence <WG1564>, and departed <WG402> <WG5656> into <WG1519> the coasts <WG3313> of TZor <WG5184> and <WG2532> TZidon <WG4605>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, a woman <WG1135> of Kanahan <WG5478> came <WG1831> <WG5631> out of <WG575> the same <WG1565> coasts <WG3725>, and cried <WG2905> <WG5656> unto him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Have mercy <WG1653> <WG5657> on me <WG3165>, O YY <WG2962>, thou Son <WG5207> of David <WG1138>; my <WG3450> daughter <WG2364> is grievously <WG2560> vexed with a devil <WG1139> <WG5736>.

But <WG1161> he answered <WG611> <WG5662> her <WG846> not <WG3756> a word <WG3056>. And <WG2532> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> came <WG4334> <WG5631> and besought <WG2065> <WG5707> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Send <WG630> her <WG846> away <WG630> <WG5657>; for <WG3754> she crieth <WG2896> <WG5719> after <WG3693> us <WG2257>.

But <WG1161> he answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, I am <WG649> not <WG3756> sent <WG649> <WG5648> but <WG1508> unto <WG1519> the lost <WG622> <WG5756> sheep <WG4263> of the house <WG3624> of Yisra'EL <WG2474>.
Then <WG1161> came she <WG2064> <WG5631> and worshipped <WG4352> <WG5707> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, YY <WG2962>, help <WG997> <WG5720> me <WG3427>.

But <WG1161> he answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, It is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> meet <WG2570> to take <WG2983> <WG5629> the children's <WG5043> bread <WG740>, and <WG2532> to cast <WG906> <WG5629> it to dogs <WG2952>.

And <WG1161> she said <WG2036> <WG5627>, TRut <WG3483>, YY <WG2962>: yet <WG2532> <WG1063> the dogs <WG2952> eat <WG2068> <WG5719> of <WG575> the crumbs <WG5589> which <WG3588> fall <WG4098> <WG5723> from <WG575> their <WG846> masters <WG2962>' table <WG5132>.

Then <WG5119> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto her <WG846>, O <WG5599> woman <WG1135>, great <WG3173> is thy <WG4675> faith <WG4102>: be it <WG1096> <WG5676> unto thee <WG4671> even as <WG5613> thou wilt <WG2309> <WG5719>. And <WG2532> her <WG846> daughter <WG2364> was made whole <WG2390> <WG5681> from <WG575> that very <WG1565> hour <WG5610>.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> departed <WG3327> <WG5631> from thence <WG1564>, and came <WG2064> <WG5627> nigh unto <WG3844> the sea <WG2281> of the Galil <WG1056>; and <WG2532> went up <WG305> <WG5631> into <WG1519> a mountain <WG3735>, and sat down <WG2521> <WG5711> there <WG1563>.

And <WG2532> great <WG4183> multitudes <WG3793> came <WG4334> <WG5656> unto him <WG846>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> with <WG3326> them those that were <WG1438> lame <WG5560>, blind <WG5185>, dumb <WG2974>, maimed <WG2948>, and <WG2532> many <WG4183> others <WG2087>, and <WG2532> cast <WG4496> them <WG846> down <WG4496> <WG5656> at <WG3844> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>' feet <WG4228>; and <WG2532> he healed <WG2323> <WG5656> them <WG846>:

Insomuch that <WG5620> the multitude <WG3793> wondered <WG2296> <WG5658>, when they saw <WG991> <WG5723> the dumb <WG2974> to speak <WG2980> <WG5723>, the maimed <WG2948> to be whole <WG5199>, the lame <WG5560> to walk <WG4043> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> the blind <WG5185> to see <WG991> <WG5723>: and <WG2532> they glorified <WG1392> <WG5656> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of Yisra'EL <WG2474>.

Then <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> called <WG4341> <WG5666> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> unto him, and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, I have compassion <WG4697> <WG5736> on <WG1909> the multitude <WG3793>, because <WG3754> they continue <WG4357> <WG5719> with me <WG3427> now <WG2235> three <WG5140> days <WG2250>, and <WG2532> have <WG2192> <WG5719> nothing <WG3756> <WG5101> to eat <WG5315> <WG5632>: and <WG2532> I will <WG2309> <WG5719> not <WG3756> send <WG630> them <WG846> away <WG630> <WG5658> fasting <WG3523>, lest <WG3379> they faint <WG1590> <WG5686> in <WG1722> the way <WG3598>.

And <WG2532> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Whence <WG4159> should we <WG2254> have so much <WG5118> bread <WG740> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2047>, as <WG5620> to fill <WG5526> <WG5658> so great <WG5118> a multitude <WG3793>?

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, How many <WG4214> loaves <WG740> have ye <WG2192> <WG5719>? And <WG1161> they said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Seven <WG2033>, and <WG2532> a few <WG3641> little fishes <WG2485>.
And <WG2532> he commanded <WG2753> <WG5656> the multitude <WG3793> to sit down <WG377> <WG5629> on <WG1909> the ground <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> he took <WG2983> <WG5631> the seven <WG2033> loaves <WG740> and <WG2532> the fishes <WG2486>, and gave thanks <WG2168> <WG5660>, and brake <WG2806> <WG5656> them, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> <WG5656> to his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, and <WG1161> the Talmidim <WG3101> to the multitude <WG3793>.

And <WG2532> they did <WG5315> all <WG3956> eat <WG5315> <WG5627>, and <WG2532> were filled <WG5526> <WG5681>: and <WG2532> they took up <WG142> <WG5656> of the broken <WG2801> meat that was left <WG4052> <WG5723> seven <WG2033> baskets <WG4711> full <WG4134>.
And <WG1161> they that did eat <WG2068> <WG5723> were <WG2258> <WG5713> four thousand <WG5070> men <WG435>, beside <WG5565> women <WG1135> and <WG2532> children <WG3813>.

And <WG2532> he sent away <WG630> <WG5660> the multitude <WG3793>, and took <WG1684> <WG5627> ship <WG1519> <WG4143>, and <WG2532> came <WG2064> <WG5627> into <WG1519> the coasts <WG3725> of Magdala <WG3093>.
